item.title: Product documentation, Information architecture, Content strategy
item.description: Context As Redocly’s first Technical Writer Advocate, the goal of this role is to help the community of technical writers by advocating for a docs-like-code approach and offering them the skills and know-how for how to make it happen. Problem Redocly makes API design and documentation software with the goal to improve the writer and developer experience. As part of this goal, they required a Technical Writer Advocate to not only assist with writing technical content, but also needed someone to
